Description:
Meet the .NET team at NDC London 2026 to explore the latest in .NET 10, Azure, and AI-powered development through sessions and 1:1 meetups.

The post [Join Microsoft at NDC London 2026 ‚Äì Let‚Äôs Build the Future of .NET Together](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/join-us-at-ndc-london-2026/) appeared first on [.NET Blog](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet).
Author: .NET Team
EnhancedContent:
NDC London is here, with pre-conference workshops running January 26‚Äì27 and the main conference running January 28‚Äì30. If you‚Äôre a .NET or Azure developer, this is the place to be. Whether you want to sharpen your cloud-native skills, get hands-on with AI-powered development, learn from Microsoft engineers, or simply connect with people who love shipping great software, NDC London always delivers. This year, Microsoft is showing up in a bigger, more meaningful way ‚Äì and we can‚Äôt wait to meet you.

## üåü Meet the Microsoft Speakers Shaping the Future of .NET

Expect a strong lineup of Microsoft speakers and MVPs delivering deep technical talks across .NET, AI, cloud-native development, and app modernization. Fan favorites like Chris Ayers, Damian Brady, Gerald Versluis, Steve Sanderson, and more ‚Äì all delivering deeply technical sessions spanning AI-assisted development, cloud-native architecture, and modern .NET patterns. Whether you‚Äôre interested in performance tuning, agentic AI, Aspire, or real-world modernization stories, this year‚Äôs Microsoft presence gives you direct access to the people building the tools you use every day.

## üè¢ Visit the Microsoft Booth ‚Äì Let‚Äôs Talk Modernization, AI, and What You‚Äôre Building

Microsoft will be on the show floor all three main conference days (January 28‚Äì30) with a staffed booth ready for real, technical conversations. Swing by Booth #11, located on the main floor of the expo space.

Here‚Äôs why you‚Äôll want to stop by:

- Latest demos on the latest announcements and technologies.
- 1:1 expert meetups with Microsoft speakers and engineers to talk through your modernization challenges, AI questions, or architectural patterns you‚Äôre exploring.
- Swag and resources ‚Äì distributed throughout the event (and yes, it will run out, so earlier is better).

We‚Äôll also be sharing guidance on .NET 10, GitHub Copilot, modernization tooling, Azure SRE Agent, and Managed Instance on Azure App Service ‚Äì all hot topics for teams looking to move faster and modernize intelligently.

## üéØ See You in London

Whether you‚Äôre exploring cloud-native patterns, scaling legacy .NET apps, adopting AI copilots, or just want to connect with thousands of passionate developers, we want to meet you at NDC London.

Come find us at Booth #11 January 28‚Äì30. We can‚Äôt wait to learn what you‚Äôre building ‚Äì and help you build what‚Äôs next.
Title: Join Microsoft at NDC London 2026 ‚Äì Let‚Äôs Build the Future of .NET Together
